021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.command.BaseCommand;
023import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.PercentBigDecimal;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.impl.BukkitCMDSource;
027import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Command;
028import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
029import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
030import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Named;
031import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Subcommand;
032import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
033import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.actor.BukkitCommandActor;
034import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.annotation.CommandPermission;
035import revxrsal.commands.help.Help;
036
037/**
038 * MoneyCommands
039 *
040 * @author creatorfromhell
041 * @since 0.1.2.0
042 */
043@Command({ "money", "eco", "mybal" })
044public class MoneyCommand {
045
046  //@DefaultFor({ "mybal" })
047  @Subcommand({ "balmenu", "menu", "mybal" })
048  @Usage("Money.MyBal.Arguments")
049  @Description("Money.MyBal.Description")
050  @CommandPermission("tne.money.mybal")
051  public void onMyBal(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
052
053    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onMyBal(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
054  }
055
056  @Subcommand({ "help", "?" })
057  @Usage("Help.Arguments")
058  @Description("Help.Description")
059  public void help(final BukkitCommandActor actor, final Help.RelatedCommands<?> commands, @Default("1") final int page) {
060
061    BaseCommand.help(new BukkitCMDSource(actor), commands, page);
062  }
063
064  //@DefaultFor({ "bal", "money", "eco", "balance" })
065  @Subcommand({ "balance", "bal", "val" })
066  @Usage("Money.Balance.Arguments")
067  @Description("Money.Balance.Description")
068  @CommandPermission("tne.money.balance")
069  public void onBalance(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
070
071    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onBalance(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), currency, region);
072  }
073
074  @Subcommand({ "convert" })
075  @Usage("Money.Convert.Arguments")
076  @Description("Money.Convert.Description")
077  @CommandPermission("tne.money.convert")
078  public void onConvert(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final PercentBigDecimal amount, @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Named("currencyfrom") final Currency from) {
079
080    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onConvert(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, from);
081  }
082
083  @Subcommand({ "deposit" })
084  @Usage("Money.Deposit.Arguments")
085  @Description("Money.Deposit.Description")
086  @CommandPermission("tne.money.deposit")
087  public void onDeposit(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
088
089    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onDeposit(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
090  }
091
092  @Subcommand({ "giveall", "+a", "addall" })
093  @Usage("Money.GiveAll.Arguments")
094  @Description("Money.GiveAll.Description")
095  @CommandPermission("tne.money.giveall")
096  public void onGiveAll(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
097
098    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveAll(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, region, currency);
099  }
100
101  @Subcommand({ "give", "+", "add" })
102  @Usage("Money.Give.Arguments")
103  @Description("Money.Give.Description")
104  @CommandPermission("tne.money.give")
105  public void onGive(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney parseMoney, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
106
107    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGive(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, parseMoney, region, currency);
108  }
109
110  @Subcommand({ "givenote", "+note", "addnote" })
111  @Usage("Money.GiveNote.Arguments")
112  @Description("Money.GiveNote.Description")
113  @CommandPermission("tne.money.givenote")
114  public void onGiveNote(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
115
116    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveNote(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
117  }
118
119  @Subcommand({ "note", "n" })
120  @Usage("Money.Note.Arguments")
121  @Description("Money.Note.Description")
122  @CommandPermission("tne.money.note")
123  public void onNote(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
124
125    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onNote(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency);
126  }
127
128  @Subcommand({ "other", "check", "balo" })
129  @Usage("Money.Other.Arguments")
130  @Description("Money.Other.Description")
131  @CommandPermission("tne.money.other")
132  public void onOther(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
133
134    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onOther(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, region, currency);
135  }
136
137  @Subcommand({ "pay", "send", "transfer" })
138  @Usage("Money.Pay.Arguments")
139  @Description("Money.Pay.Description")
140  @CommandPermission("tne.money.pay")
141  public void onPay(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("") final String from) {
142
143    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onPay(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency, from);
144  }
145
146  @Subcommand({ "request" })
147  @Usage("Money.Request.Arguments")
148  @Description("Money.Request.Description")
149  @CommandPermission("tne.money.Request")
150  public void onRequest(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
151
152    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onRequest(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
153  }
154
155  @Subcommand({ "set", "eq", "=" })
156  @Usage("Money.Set.Arguments")
157  @Description("Money.Set.Description")
158  @CommandPermission("tne.money.set")
159  public void onSet(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
160
161    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, region, currency);
162  }
163
164  @Subcommand({ "setall" })
165  @Usage("Money.SetAll.Arguments")
166  @Description("Money.SetAll.Description")
167  @CommandPermission("tne.money.setall")
168  public void onSetAll(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
169
170    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSetAll(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, region, currency);
171  }
172
173  @Subcommand({ "switch", "swap" })
174  @Usage("Money.Switch.Arguments")
175  @Description("Money.Switch.Description")
176  @CommandPermission("tne.money.switch")
177  public void onSwitch(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("switched") final Account account) {
178
179    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSwitch(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), account);
180  }
181
182  @Subcommand({ "take", "minus", "remove", "-" })
183  @Usage("Money.Take.Arguments")
184  @Description("Money.Take.Description")
185  @CommandPermission("tne.money.take")
186  public void onTake(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
187
188    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTake(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, region, currency);
189  }
190
191  @Subcommand({ "top", "baltop" })
192  @Usage("Money.Top.Arguments")
193  @Description("Money.Top.Description")
194  @CommandPermission("tne.money.top")
195  public void onTop(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("1") final Integer page, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("false") final Boolean refresh) {
196
197    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTop(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), page, currency, refresh);
198  }
199
200  @Subcommand({ "withdraw" })
201  @Usage("Money.Withdraw.Arguments")
202  @Description("Money.Withdraw.Description")
203  @CommandPermission("tne.money.withdraw")
204  public void onWithdraw(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
205
206    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onWithdraw(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
207  }
208}
